version_description:
1. Upgraded the comic reader, you can slide into the next episode without clicking any button, which make your reading more smoother!
2. Some episodes support "Waiting for free", as long as you have patience and perseverance, comics can be viewed for free.
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for using MangaToon!
To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes Store & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates.
Every update of our Weibo app includes improvements for speed and reliability.

Download the MangaToon for free, and enjoy your comic life.

1. Improved UI & Minor bug fixes
2. We have the Thai version now! Thai users can upgrade to our latest version, and then go to [Mine]--[Setting] (the gear-shaped button on the upper right corner)--[language] to change the language.
3. New Features: Sign in with Apple and Dark Model support for iOS 13.

1. Improved UI & Minor bug fixes
2. We have the Thai version now! Thai users can upgrade to our latest version, and then go to [Mine]--[Setting] (the gear-shaped button on the upper right corner)--[language] to change the language.
3. New Features: Sign in with Apple and Dark Model support for iOS 13.

1. Improved UI & Minor bug fixes
2. We have the Thai version now! Thai users can upgrade to our latest version, and then go to [Mine]--[Setting] (the gear-shaped button on the upper right corner)--[language] to change the language.
3. New Features: Sign in with Apple and Dark Model support for iOS 13.

1. Optimize the loading of video incentive ads.
2. Fix the problem that my comments can only view recent comments.

4. Optimize the bookshelf page download manager.
5. Some other feedbacks.
